events.message: We have received the application from the software engineer candidate who specializes in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The candidate's profile has been categorised under Engineering as they have extensive experience in DevOps and software development.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to manage the application process and coordinate next steps with the candidate.
Initial screening call was conducted with the candidate to assess technical skills and cultural fit for the software engineering position.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward to the technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the lead developer to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving ability.
